title: Tend
description: We’ll help you find deep discounts all over the internet so you can stretch your budget a little further.

hero.headline: SPEND LESS. SAVE MORE.
hero.subCopy: We’ll help you find deep discounts everywhere, so you can stretch your budget a little further.

moduleTwo.headline: Score 50%, 60% and 70% off.
moduleTwo.body: Find the best deals on over 200,000 items, curated daily from top retailers like Macy’s, Walgreens and Best Buy. All the money-saving benefits of bargain hunting, way less time spent messaging strangers on the internet.
